topic.title: Inventory Tab
topic.shortdesc: The Inventory tab allows you to set general parameters for the inventory part of the application.

body.p: Interfacing with OCSNG enables automated inventory of equipment. Once the option Mode OCSNG is enabled, two new menus appear in the interface. The first, in the Setup to configure the connection to servers OCSNG. The second, in the Tools, allows the daily relations management with the defined servers.

When creating a template, you can add fields automatically generated from a model (i.e. the name of the equipment, inventory number). The increment values of these fields is done either by individual entity or as a whole.
It is possible to automatically change the software category deleted by the dictionary. By default they are moved automatically in the category FUSION.

An option can also specify the behavior to the removal of a machine in OCSNG : Either it is put in the Recycle Bin (default behavior currently used by lower versions of GLPI) or it is possible to change its status, or do nothing at all.

GLPI can also transfer a computer in another entity if one of the criteria used for the assignment to a entity is changed. If the option Rules for assigning a computer to an entity indicates an existing model, at each update a computer the OCSNG rules of assignment of entities engine will be replayed. If the resulting entity is different from the entity of the computer, it will be transferred.
The start date of the fiscal year used in the management is configured here.

When manually creating a computer, it is asked to the user to choose the type of management (unit or global) of the latter. Subsequently, a hardware managed unit can pass under the mode of global management. It is possible to restrict the type of management according to the computer.

When connecting directly to a computer an item managed as a unit, it is possible to assign information retrieved from the computer. When disconnecting, you can delete this information. These features are not enabled by default.
